version_description:
• It's time to go back to school! Build a university in time to receive a special reward!
• Play with friends in the Airport City iMessage Challenge! Test your skills to set the high score and get bonuses daily.
• Choose a new emblem for your alliance in the Alliance Office.
• Take screenshots of your city from the Settings menu.

New special event! Build a burial vault in your city and help Professor Klandau perform the ritual of the pharaohs to learn the secret of eternal life!

• Complete all tasks in time to get the astonishing Gates of Amun.
• Send flights to Giza, Mycenae, Dahshur, and other ancient necropoleis.
• Acquire new paranormal collections.

New event! Twilight fell on Airport City, bringing along a horde of terrible monsters. Find a way to fight the ghosts and seal the portal that they're coming from to receive a special reward. Professor Klandau is here to help you!
iPhone X native support: Develop your Airport City on a scale never seen before.

New adventure! Have a Thanksgiving Day celebration in your Airport City! Help Jane the stewardess to provide fine dishes and fireworks for your guests to enjoy, and keep up the spirit of adventure! Complete all the tasks in time to receive a Fall Mansion!

INTRODUCING HELICOPTERS!
Explore places planes can't reach with fast and beautiful choppers!

BUILD A HELIPORT
• Command Center
• New Terminal
• Resource Factories
• Meteorological Lab
• Helipads

NEW PASSENGERS: TOURISTS
• Build hotels for tourists
• The bigger your city, the more tourists you can attract

SPARROW & CROSSBILL HELICOPTERS
• Fly tourists to national parks and waterfalls
• High-speed golden helicopters are available in the Alliance Office

HAPPY HOLIDAYS!
Grab a new helicopter and prepare for the big winter adventure!

GOLDFINCH HELICOPTER
• Expand your heliport with a variety of new buildings
• Fly tourists to world-known mountains
• Get a high-speed Goldfinch S2 in the Alliance Office

NEW COLLECTIONS
• Acquire collections by taking tourists to national parks, waterfalls, and mountains
• Get unique buildings as a reward

WINTER ADVENTURE
• Help Santa with delivering gifts to kids
• Use Candy Canes to puchase special buildings and bonuses

HAPPY HOLIDAYS!
Grab a new helicopter and prepare for the big winter adventure!

GOLDFINCH HELICOPTER
• Expand your heliport with a variety of new buildings
• Fly tourists to world-known mountains
• Get a high-speed Goldfinch S2 in the Alliance Office

NEW COLLECTIONS
• Acquire collections by taking tourists to national parks, waterfalls, and mountains
• Get unique buildings as a reward

WINTER ADVENTURE
• Help Santa with delivering gifts to kids
• Use Candy Canes to puchase special buildings and bonuses

NEW ADVENTURE! The winter Rock Festival is kicking off in Airport City!

Complete Chris Rock's quests: build a Music Arena, collect musical instruments from guest planes, and acquire biker jackets from the festival camping site! It's a great opportunity to melt the ice with rockin' hot tunes and receive a unique building as a gift - the Rock Café!

UI IMPROVEMENTS
We have changed the interface of several game windows to improve your airport building experience.

ROMANTIC ADVENTURE
• A Walk in the Clouds event is starting in Airport City!
• Time to surprise, give flowers, and enjoy a romantic atmosphere! Help lonely hearts find true love—dispatch flights full of lovers to romantic destinations, and assemble wedding collections to get the amazing Crystal Manor!

MAKE YOUR CITY UNIQUE
• Visit the store to exchange Candy Hearts for bonuses and unique buildings like the Flower Castle, Lake of Romance, and others.

TONS OF FUN!
Airport City's residents are preparing to celebrate St. Patrick's Day!

Holy moly! Have you seen the dancing leprechauns all around the city? Catch them, assemble the collection and get an awesome bonus: a Pot of Gold! It'll increase your commercial buildings' profitability.

Collect Clover for good luck and send flights to Ireland; really get into the festival spirit and have loads of fun! Become good friends with Lady Luck and the unique Leprechaun Museum building will be yours!

Easter Cheer comes to Airport City.

HOLY MOLY! BUNNIES EVERYWHERE!

Easter is coming, and that means clover has started growing all over the Airport Cities, attracting funny Easter bunnies!
Cut the clover with silver sickles, feed the bunnies, and assemble Easter collections. The reward won't disappoint! Complete the adventure in time and win an awesome Easter Workshop!

Easter Cheer comes to Airport City. A subscription service is now available.

HOLY MOLY! BUNNIES EVERYWHERE!

Easter is coming, and that means clover has started growing all over the Airport Cities, attracting funny Easter bunnies!
Cut the clover with silver sickles, feed the bunnies, and assemble Easter collections. The reward won't disappoint! Complete the adventure in time and win an awesome Easter Workshop!

NEW SUBSCRIPTION SERVICE

Gold and Silver subscriptions are now available for those seeking to expand opportunities and climb up the leaderboards! Get increased fuel supply, handy bonuses, clear skies and planes that never break, and show your neighbors a brand new side to your city.
Try it out! The first week's on us.

Easter Cheer comes to Airport City. A subscription service is now available.

HOLY MOLY! BUNNIES EVERYWHERE!

Easter is coming, and that means clover has started growing all over the Airport Cities, attracting funny Easter bunnies!
Cut the clover with silver sickles, feed the bunnies, and assemble Easter collections. The reward won't disappoint! Complete the adventure in time and win an awesome Easter Workshop!

NEW SUBSCRIPTION SERVICE

Gold and Silver subscriptions are now available for those seeking to expand opportunities and climb up the leaderboards! Get increased fuel supply, handy bonuses, clear skies and planes that never break, and show your neighbors a brand new side to your city.
Try it out! The first week's on us.

A volcano erupted near your city! A new league system introduced to adventures.

THRILLING ADVENTURE!
Age of Ash event is here! Send your planes on volcanic voyages, build an Institute of Volcanology and an Institute of Seismology, get your own Jumbo Ranger and harness the volcano.

EVENT RATINGS
Compete with other players in several leagues and win valuable rewards.

SPECIAL BUILDINGS
A Volcanic Lake, an Ashen House and other unique buildings await you in our special store.

THRILLING ADVENTURE!
The heat is on: a volcano has started erupting near your city!
Age of Ash event is here! Send your planes on volcanic voyages, build an Institute of Volcanology and an Institute of Seismology, get your own Jumbo Ranger and harness the volcano.

EVENT RATINGS
Compete with other players in several leagues and win valuable rewards.

SPECIAL BUILDINGS
A Volcanic Lake, an Ashen House and other unique buildings await you in our special store.

THRILLING ADVENTURE!
The heat is on: a volcano has started erupting near your city!
Age of Ash event is here! Send your planes on volcanic voyages, build an Institute of Volcanology and an Institute of Seismology, get your own Jumbo Ranger and harness the volcano.

EVENT RATINGS
Compete with other players in several leagues and win valuable rewards.

SPECIAL BUILDINGS
A Volcanic Lake, an Ashen House and other unique buildings await you in our special store.

URGENT DELIVERIES

Oh boy, letters and parcels are falling from the sky! We need to figure out what's going on! Collect the lost mail around your city and your neighbours' cities and send planes on special mail flights. Complete the adventure successfully and get a unique Central Telegraph building.

NEW BUILDINGS

Build a Post Office and Mail Kiosk, get Letters by participating in the adventure rating, and discover Pigeon House, Arrow Marking, and other interesting buildings in the special store.

URGENT DELIVERIES

Oh boy, letters and parcels are falling from the sky! We need to figure out what's going on! Collect the lost mail around your city and your neighbours' cities and send planes on special mail flights. Complete the adventure successfully and get a unique Central Telegraph building.

NEW BUILDINGS

Build a Post Office and Mail Kiosk, get Letters by participating in the adventure rating, and discover Pigeon House, Arrow Marking, and other interesting buildings in the special store.

THE AMERICAN DREAM
Who said that dreaming was a waste of time? Exploring new lands, building cities and reaching your goals is amazing! The Land of Opportunity adventure is starting in Airport City, and that means the sky will be lit with fireworks, and the air will be filled with freedom!

EPIC ARCHITECTURE
Receive guest planes, dispatch American flights, and get fireworks that you can exchange for the Library of Congress, Lincoln Memorial, and other buildings at the special store.

THE AMERICAN DREAM
Who said that dreaming was a waste of time? Exploring new lands, building cities and reaching your goals is amazing! The Land of Opportunity adventure is starting in Airport City, and that means the sky will be lit with fireworks, and the air will be filled with freedom!

EPIC ARCHITECTURE
Receive guest planes, dispatch American flights, and get fireworks that you can exchange for the Library of Congress, Lincoln Memorial, and other buildings at the special store.

ROCK THE CITY
There are festival tents around Airport City, and the main stage is almost ready. Looks like it’s Time to Rock! Celebrate music and freedom: survive the tsunami of attendees and withstand the bass grooves to get the unique Tour Truck Park!

NEW BUILDINGS
Get bonuses and colorful buildings from the special adventure store. Check it out: you can get the Tattoo Parlor and the Biker Bar in exchange for Drumsticks!

ROCK THE CITY
There are festival tents around Airport City, and the main stage is almost ready. Looks like it’s Time to Rock! Celebrate music and freedom: survive the tsunami of attendees and withstand the bass grooves to get the unique Tour Truck Park!

NEW BUILDINGS
Get bonuses and colorful buildings from the special adventure store. Check it out: you can get the Tattoo Parlor and the Biker Bar in exchange for Drumsticks!

NEW QUESTS
The start of the game just got more interesting! Assemble collections by choosing popular tourist destinations.

NOT ALONE
Sci-fi tech is available to players lvl 16 and up in the “It Came from Outer Space” adventure! Defend against the aliens or befriend them? Find out, and the Enigma House will be yours! Study UFO debris, dispatch flights to mysterious places, and get Sonic Emitters. You can exchange them for buildings like Amalthea Ice, Jupiter Storm and others at the special store.

NEW QUESTS
The start of the game just got more interesting! Assemble collections by choosing popular tourist destinations.

NOT ALONE
Sci-fi tech is available to players lvl 16 and up in the “It Came from Outer Space” adventure! Defend against the aliens or befriend them? Find out, and the Enigma House will be yours! Study UFO debris, dispatch flights to mysterious places, and get Sonic Emitters. You can exchange them for buildings like Amalthea Ice, Jupiter Storm and others at the special store.

GIFT MARATHON
Airport City is celebrating its birthday, and we’ve prepared some awesome gifts for you. Visit the game every day and get cool bonuses!

KNOWLEDGE IS POWER!
Autumn has come, and the students are going off to universities. All hail science and new innovative ideas! Experiment, collect Lab Flasks and exchange them for the Armillary Sphere, School for Gifted Children, and other buildings at the special store. Master the sciences and get the Innovation Center!

GIFT MARATHON
Airport City is celebrating its birthday, and we’ve prepared some awesome gifts for you. Visit the game every day and get cool bonuses!

KNOWLEDGE IS POWER!
Autumn has come, and the students are going off to universities. All hail science and new innovative ideas! Experiment, collect Lab Flasks and exchange them for the Armillary Sphere, School for Gifted Children, and other buildings at the special store. Master the sciences and get the Innovation Center!

FAIRYTALE TEA PARTY
Wonderland is closer than you think! Jump into the Rabbit Hole without fear. Fly the Plane of Hearts, assemble magic collections, and receive the Time Tower.

MAGIC ARCHITECTURE
Dispatch flights to good old England, complete quests, and receive Magic Keys. You can exchange them for the Oak House, Chess Park, and other amazing buildings at the special store.

ANCIENT POWERS

Sometimes interest in history can lead to unexpected results! Professor Klandau got too close to the ancient secrets, and now… Wait a second, looks like his mind and body have been taken over by some spirit! Also, what are all these possessed passengers doing in Airport City? Can you handle the spirits of the past and bring peace to the city? Do it, and you’ll get the amazing Pharaoh Statue!

ANCIENT POWERS

Sometimes interest in history can lead to unexpected results! Professor Klandau got too close to the ancient secrets, and now… Wait a second, looks like his mind and body have been taken over by some spirit! Also, what are all these possessed passengers doing in Airport City? Can you handle the spirits of the past and bring peace to the city? Do it, and you’ll get the amazing Pharaoh Statue!

KNOWLEDGE IS POWER!
A new school year is starting: make experiments at the University, collect Lab Flasks and exchange them for Armillary Sphere, School for Gifted Children, and other buildings at the special store. Master all the sciences and get the Temple of Knowledge as a reward!

FIXES AND IMPROVEMENTS
We’ve fixed and improved the things that needed fixing and improving. Thank you for flying with us!

DRAGONS & FIREWORKS
Demons have spawned around Airport City! Get your hands on Firecrackers and banish them before they spoil the holiday. Help Victoria construct a beautiful Dragon Installation near the city. Complete the adventure and get the Fireworks Factory as a reward!

EASTERN ARCHITECTURE
Fly to China, complete quests and get Red Envelopes. You can exchange them for the Emperor’s Tower, Statue of Wealth and other amazing buildings at a special store.

ON THE OTHER SIDE
Open your own game studio and develop games! Learn the history of game development by assembling new collections from flights around the world. Complete the adventure in time and get the fantastic Arcade Park!

CODE, SWEAT & PIXELS
Become a game developer and get special event tokens. You can exchange them for unique helicopters, buildings, and alliance badges at the event store.

DRAGONS & FIREWORKS
Demons have spawned around Airport City! Get your hands on Firecrackers and banish them before they spoil the holiday. Help Victoria construct a beautiful Dragon Installation near the city. Complete the adventure and get the Fireworks Factory as a reward!

EASTERN ARCHITECTURE
Fly to China, complete quests and get Red Envelopes. You can exchange them for the Emperor’s Tower, Statue of Wealth and other amazing buildings at a special store.

BEST AIRPORT IN THE WORLD
Build your very own airport and manage it! Unlock new cities on the world map and assemble a collection of exotic items. Improve the infrastructure, build a large fleet of planes and service all of them – like in a real airport.

THE PERFECT CITY
Build the city of your dreams! Get ready for hundreds of unique buildings and landmarks: houses and parks, shops and cafés, skyscrapers and castles. Exciting adventures are waiting for you!

KNOWLEDGE IS POWER!
A new school year is starting: make experiments at the University, collect Lab Flasks and exchange them for Armillary Sphere, School for Gifted Children, and other buildings at the special store. Master all the sciences and get the Temple of Knowledge as a reward!

FIXES AND IMPROVEMENTS
We’ve fixed and improved the things that needed fixing and improving. Thank you for flying with us!

ANCIENT FORCES
Sometimes, a passion for history can lead to unexpected results! Professor Klandau came too close to ancient mysteries and is now obsessed by strange ideas, as well as many other passengers. Triumph over evil spirits of the past and get an Amphitheater as a reward!

FIXES AND IMPROVEMENTS
We continue to fix and improve all that needs fixing and improving. Beware of the air pockets in the clouds!

FIGHT THE UNKNOWN
Those campfire stories turned out to be true: mysterious dark hurricanes are all around, and ghost planes are approaching to land. Will you save Airport City from the evil forces together with Prof. Klandau? Get ready for new flights and ghastly collections. This will be abysmally exciting!

CHARMING DARKNESS
Take part in the adventure and get Ectoplasm. You can exchange it for the Bottomless Well, Spooky Camp, and other thematic buildings at the special store.

ON THE OTHER SIDE
Open your own game studio and develop games! Learn the history of game development by assembling new collections from flights around the world. Complete the adventure in time and get the fantastic Arcade Park!

CODE, SWEAT & PIXELS
Become a game developer and get special event tokens. You can exchange them for unique helicopters, buildings, and alliance badges at the event store.

THE SPRING WIND
Spring is coming to Airport City: Snowdrops are starting to bloom, and colorful butterflies are floating through the air. Get your Butterfly Net and head over to the park. Let spring take over, complete the adventure, and get the Thermal Spa! You can also buy Romantic Corner, Skate Park and other unique items from the special store.

LUCKY CLOVER
The residents of Airport City are ready to celebrate St. Patrick’s Day, and the town is already surrounded by dancing leprechauns. The saying goes that if you catch one, you’ll get a real Pot of Gold! Collect clovers for good luck, dispatch flights to Ireland, and have a blast! Don’t miss your lucky chance, and the unique Malt House will be yours!

FIREWORKS OVERHEAD
A huge holiday event is coming to Airport City - The Land of Opportunity! The fireworks are sparkling brightly in the sky, and the spirit of freedom is in the air! Find out what freedom means, who the Founding Fathers were, and get the Baseball Stadium as a reward.

MONUMENTAL ARCHITECTURE
Get fireworks for completing adventure quests and exchange them for the Library of Congress, Lincoln Memorial, and other buildings at the special store.
